dcterms:description: The MATH dataset consists of problems collected from high school math competitions, along with human-written solutions that include both natural language explanations and final ground-truth solutions. It is challenging for large language models, with state-of-the-art models achieving only around 42.5% pass-at-1 accuracy.
dcterms:title: MATH

dcterms:creator: Hunter Lightman
Vineet Kosaraju
Yura Burda
Harrison Edwards
Bowen Baker
Teddy Lee
Jan Leike
John Schulman
Ilya Sutskever
Karl Cobbe
dcterms:description: The PRM800K dataset provides a collection of solutions generated by GPT-4 for a subset of problems in the MATH dataset. It is used to enhance the training of models by providing additional correct step-by-step solutions.
dcterms:title: PRM800K
